resource.chars:
in drawings of nebulae 
made by different 
observers at various times.
Explanation of the Plate.
The first figure shows <u>Polaris <\u>,
together with some of the 
stars which are visible near 
it, repeated thirteen times 
with exposures of 1s, 2s, 4s, 8s
16 s, 32s, 1m, 2m, 4m, 8m, 16m, 32m
and 64 minutes.
The second figure shows 
the four stars forming the 
<u>Trapezium <\u> and traces of
the Nebula in Orion
